subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer said her six-month-long stomach ache was under control, which meant she could finish high on the leader board in the L.P.G.A.’s Sybase Classic.
snippet: Paula Creamer said her six-month-long stomach ache was under control, which meant she could finish high on the leader board in the L.P.G.A.’s Sybase Classic.
